data.title: About Us
data.text:
Our Commitment

As a Foundation, we commit to delivering impactful programmes and amplifying our impact to as many deserving youths as possible. We also commit to ensuring good governance and transparency as a Foundation to preserve the trust of the public.

Development Programmes

Amplifying Impact

Good Governance

The Foundation is governed by an experienced Board of Trustees and audited by the National Audit Department. As a tax-exempt statutory body, the Foundation is also subjected to guidelines by Lembaga Hasil Dalam Negeri Malaysia (LHDNM) and its annual reports are presented to Parliament.

Form collaborative efforts in partnerships to be able to impact more deserving Malaysians from diverse backgrounds with the gift of education.

Design and deliver programmes that supports high-potential and deserving students in secondary school, university, and the workforce while developing themselves as young leaders.

Our Programmes

Our programmes are designed with one central goal in mind: to empower under-represented youths as leaders of themselves, their communities, and the nation. We support them to achieve this goal through 3 key milestones in young adulthood:

Amplifying

Impact

Our mission to shape a better Malaysia is only made possible by the continuous support of our corporate organisations and university partners. Since 2019, YTAR has worked with partners and supporters who share the same vision and mission of empowering Malaysians through their educational journeys.

We are always looking for more partners to expand our impact to more impactful youths. Speak to us about our programmes and explore how you could partner with us.

Good

Governance

The Foundation is led by an exemplary Board of Trustees who are experts in their respective fields and are guiding the Foundation to empower young Malaysians in shaping a better future for themselves and for Malaysia.

As a statutory body, the Foundation is committed to providing full transparency as well as exhibiting accountability to the public. Annually, we publish our financial statements that are audited by Jabatan Audit Negara and an updated report of our work's impact.

Create MoreNation Builders.

Partner With Us.

Together, we can empower and support a new generation of Malaysian leaders in shaping a better future for themselves and for all communities as a whole.

Become A

Sponsor

A sponsorship of RM120,000 allows a Tunku Scholar to achieve their educational dreams and contribute meaningfully to their communities.

Make A

Donation

Support a Scholarâ€™s higher education journey or stretch your ringgit further by contributing to our endownment fund.

Partner

With Us

Accelerate the development of our Scholars by providing personal development, career and networking opportunities.
